text: is a town located in Tokachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 4,908 and a density of 7 persons per km². The total area is 700.87 km². Taushubetsu Bridge, a former rail bridge of the now-defunct Shihoro Line, is in Kamishihoro. ==Notable people from Kamishihoro== *Hanako Tokachi, actress ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Kamishihoro, Hokkaido
